entry.title: IOTA Identity Beta Release
entry.summary: We’re thrilled to announce the release of IOTA Identity Beta. This marks the framework as “feature complete” on the road to a 1.0 version. It includes several major milestones such as the upgrade to Chrysalis Phase 2, a simplified higher-level API including Stronghold support and an initial implementation of the DID Communications messages based on the Decentralized Identity Foundation (DIF) standard and Hyperledger Aries work.
